questions.question: 1.  Saponification value is the ____  of KOH required to saponify the fatty acids liberated from ____ of fat.
2.  The relationship between saponification value and molecular mass of oils is:
3.  _______ process is an alkaline hydrolysis of a fat to form soap.
4.  Triglycerides are natural esters of glycerol with __________

answers.a: tribasic carboxylic acids, e.g. citric acid
answers.b: high molecular weight aromatic carboxylic acids
answers.c: tribasic mineral acids, e.g. orthophosphoric acid
